umd.cs.javalisp
Class Javalisp

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--umd.cs.javalisp.Javalisp
public class Javalisp
extends java.lang.Object

Simple but vauguely general-purpose mechanism for invoking Lisp commands from within Java using files.

Field Summary
private static boolean active
          This flag is set to false if the class is unable to access Tcl; it indicates to any calling program that it should not try to invoke Tcl.
(package private) static java.lang.String CONFIGFILE
          Name of file that holds configuration info (specifically LISP and LISPLOADARG).

          Name of file used to receive responses from Lisp

Field Detail

CONFIGFILE

static final java.lang.String CONFIGFILE
Name of file that holds configuration info (specifically LISP and LISPLOADARG).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

LISP

static java.lang.String LISP
Command to invoke the Common Lisp interpretter

LISPLOADARG

static java.lang.String LISPLOADARG
A command-line argument to load a file in Lisp. For Allegro Lisp, this is "-L". For LispWorks this is "-init". For CLISP it's "-i". For other Lisp environments, see your manual.

LISPFILE

static final java.lang.String LISPFILE

INFILE

static final java.lang.String INFILE
Name of file used to receive responses from Lisp

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PARTIAL_INPUT_WAIT

static final long PARTIAL_INPUT_WAIT
Number of milliseconds to wait when there is partial input. This is zero by default but you may want to set it higher if performing many file accesses cause problems on your system.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

NO_INPUT_WAIT

static final long NO_INPUT_WAIT
Number of milliseconds to wait when there is partial input. This is zero by default but you may want to set it higher if performing many file accesses cause problems on your system.

See Also:

Javalisp
